entries.meaning: A finely ground relatively pure form of silicas used as a paint filler etc.
examples: Every little cold gust that I observed in the Colorado country had this corkscrew character  [â€¦]  an auger, of diameter varying from an inch to a thousand feet, capable of altering its direction so as to bore curved holes, revolving with incalculable rapidity, and armed with a cutting edge of silex.
